high_descs: Turn left, go to wall.  Turn right, proceed to wall, turn left to face table.
Pick up statue from back of table, left of lamp.
Turn on lamp on corner of table.
anns.task_desc: Move to table, pick up statue and turn on light.

high_descs: Move to the square wood table top in the far corner of the room
Pick up the gold statue on top of the square table
Carry the statue and face the lamp on top of the square wood table
anns.task_desc: Hold a statue while turning on a lamp

high_descs: turn left, walk to wall, turn right, walk to end of table, turn right, take a step, turn left, walk across the room, turn left to face the small table
pick up the gold dog statue that is on the table
hold the gold dog statue up to the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a gold dog statue with the lamp
